channel.title: General Shop Whore
channel.description:
This isnt much of a script request as it is an idea.
I got inspiration from someone who asked how often does someone sell party hats to the general store just for fun, and if it is possible to make a macro to watch the store on world 1 and buy valuable items really quickly.
I figured this actually isnt such a bad idea. Just put an array of bmps of all valuable items with low "actual" value (eg. obby shields, whips), and just have a character (members or free), camp the general store in varrock world 1 or fally world 2, and whenever it spots an item that matches a bitmap, it buys it. Any feedback on this idea?

item.title: General Shop Whore
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

I made a script similar to this a while back, it bought uncut gems. It could probably be done pretty easily, its just getting the bitmaps, or possibly bitmap masks.

Read full topic
